Package nl.tudelft.jpacman.level

Class MapParser

java.lang.Object
nl.tudelft.jpacman.level.MapParser
public class MapParser extends Object
Creates new Levels from text representations.
Author:
Jeroen Roosen

  • Constructor Details

    • MapParser

      public MapParser(LevelFactory levelFactory, BoardFactory boardFactory)
      Creates a new map parser.
      Parameters:
      levelFactory - The factory providing the NPC objects and the level.
      boardFactory - The factory providing the Square objects and the board.

  • Method Details

    • parseMap

      public Level parseMap(char[][] map)
      Parses the text representation of the board into an actual level.
      • Supported characters:
      • ' ' (space) an empty square.
      • '#' (bracket) a wall.
      • '.' (period) a square with a pellet.
      • 'P' (capital P) a starting square for players.
      • 'G' (capital G) a square with a ghost.
      Parameters:
      map - The text representation of the board, with map[x][y] representing the square at position x,y.
      Returns:
      The level as represented by this text.

    • addSquare

      protected void addSquare(Square[][] grid, List<Ghost> ghosts, List<Square> startPositions, int x, int y, char c)
      Adds a square to the grid based on a given character. These character come from the map files and describe the type of square.
      Parameters:
      grid - The grid of squares with board[x][y] being the square at column x, row y.
      ghosts - List of all ghosts that were added to the map.
      startPositions - List of all start positions that were added to the map.
      x - x coordinate of the square.
      y - y coordinate of the square.
      c - Character describing the square type.

    • makeGhostSquare

      protected Square makeGhostSquare(List<Ghost> ghosts, Ghost ghost)
      creates a Square with the specified ghost on it and appends the placed ghost into the ghost list.
      Parameters:
      ghosts - all the ghosts in the level so far, the new ghost will be appended
      ghost - the newly created ghost to be placed
      Returns:
      a square with the ghost on it.

    • parseMap

      public Level parseMap(List<String> text)
      Parses the list of strings into a 2-dimensional character array and passes it on to parseMap(char[][]).
      Parameters:
      text - The plain text, with every entry in the list being a equally sized row of squares on the board and the first element being the top row.
      Returns:
      The level as represented by the text.
      Throws:
      PacmanConfigurationException - If text lines are not properly formatted.

    • parseMap

      public Level parseMap(InputStream source) throws IOException
      Parses the provided input stream as a character stream and passes it result to parseMap(List).
      Parameters:
      source - The input stream that will be read.
      Returns:
      The parsed level as represented by the text on the input stream.
      Throws:
      IOException - when the source could not be read.

    • parseMap

      public Level parseMap(String mapName) throws IOException
      Parses the provided input stream as a character stream and passes it result to parseMap(List).
      Parameters:
      mapName - Name of a resource that will be read.
      Returns:
      The parsed level as represented by the text on the input stream.
      Throws:
      IOException - when the resource could not be read.

    • getBoardCreator

      protected BoardFactory getBoardCreator()
      Returns:
      the BoardCreator
